Html:
Hi,

 

I am using Dynamic Data Display and plot multiple curves on the same chart - that is I have multiple Y axes. I am unable to set the min and max values for Y axes? Can someone help me please...

Hi

Check yaxis.SetConverion(0,ymin, 100, ymax) - Replace 0 and 100 with your own converion factor values. This is smiple linear conversion

you have to keep in mind that this y axis may not be your main y axis.

Regards

Ravi

Hi Ravi,

Can you please help me to reach SetConversion function whatever i did, second Y axis take value of first Y axis..

Best Regards
